# DotNetTools.AddSource method

Adds the specified NuGet package source.

```csharp
public DotNetTools AddSource(string source)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| source | The path or URL of the NuGet package source. |

## Return Value

The `DotNetTools` instance, for use by the "fluent" builder pattern.
